headline: Union Pacific Recognized as Industry Leader in Intermodal Service in 2025
summary: OMAHA, Neb., February 10, 2026--Union Pacific has been rated North America’s best performing railroad for intermodal service in 2025 in the Intermodal Service Scorecard published by the Journal of Commerce.

headline: Are Wall Street Analysts Predicting Union Pacific Stock Will Climb or Sink?
summary: Despite lagging the broader market over the past year, Union Pacific Corporation continues to attract optimistic analyst sentiment, reflecting confidence in its long-term growth and operational recovery potential.

headline: New power: CSX signs $670M locomotive deal
summary: CSX signed a $670 million deal with Wabtec to upgrade its locomotive fleet, the latest railroad to do so. The post New power: CSX signs $670M locomotive deal appeared first on FreightWaves.
